attacks.name: Nuzzle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Nuzzle Shot
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage for each of your Pokémon in play that has the Nuzzle attack to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
